parameters.definition: Cost of one serving of Rice
Calories contained in one serving of Rice
Protein contained in one serving of Rice
Cost of one serving of Kebab
Calories contained in one serving of Kebab
Protein contained in one serving of Kebab

description: Jordan is a chef. He wants to design a diet consisting of Kebabs and Rice. Assume that each serving of Rice costs \param{CostRice} and contains \param{CalRice} calories and \param{ProtRice} grams of protein. Assume that each serving of Kebab costs \param{CostKebab} and contains \param{CalKebab} calories and \param{ProtKebab} grams of protein. He's interested in spending as little money as possible but he wants to ensure that his meals have at least \param{MinCal} calories and at least \param{MinProt} grams of protein per day. Formulate a linear programming problem that will help minimize the cost of the diet.
